reviewText: I absolutely fell in love with this movie!! The purity and innocence at the beginning of this story was very refreshing.  As the story progressed and Krishna was faced with serious challenges that kicked him into his true mantle of manhood, he certainly stepped his game up with one-pointed concentration!  And I really enjoyed how this was illustrated in the movie.  I found the special effects riveting in conjunction with the action music, and the dance numbers/songs uplifting and beautiful.  It's the best superhero movie I've seen!
Maybe even better. Though long, Krrish shows how it's the heart of a person, as well as their abilities, that make them a true hero.
